text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
──Not somewhere else, but from here

Believe my sky
Believe my dream...
Believe in my sky, believe in my dream...
(If I think logically...)
(The center of the 16 would be... Kogane────)

(L'Antica's popularity, trust,
and charm are all impeccable.)
(She would shine brightly while leading the crowd.)
(Or maybe...)

(...Amana too, she's a natural talent
who brightens the place just by being there.)

(Rather than leading,
she would be a center who supports everyone.)

──Let's go together to the sky
where we can become our true selves

Just a faint premonition to call it a start
Why is it, even God would be surprised...

(And then there's Kaho... Is she too young for such a
heavy responsibility... No, that wouldn't be an issue for her.)
(Mano... She's still new...)

(There's no rule that says the center has to be chosen
from each unit. The other girls are fine too.)

(Hiori, Meguru, Mamimi, Sakuya, Yuika, Kiriko,
Chiyoko, Juri, Rinze, Natsuha, Tenka, Chiyuki...)

(Everyone has their own unique shine.
It wouldn't be strange for anyone to be the center.)
(But still, if I had to choose one person...)

(Let's think about it again.
Not everyone for the center to shine, but)
(A center who can make everyone shine.)

Whatever kind of person I am, I'll bring myself along
properly. Next to today that I will grow to love
(────Kogane, Meguru, Hiori, Mano...)
There you are, shining brightly
────Mano!
...Will you take on this responsibility?

I think you can connect everyone,
like how you connected Hiori and Meguru.
I... haven't done anything...

Mano, you have many wonderful qualities,
More than you think.
But you see, it's not because of that that I want to ask you.

Mano and everyone else have their own wonderful qualities,
and I respect each and every one of you.

Y-yes...
I feel the same way...

...Yes.
Mano, you would surely stay close to everyone like that.

Everyone is special,
and everyone is just an ordinary girl.
You'll stay by their side just as you are.

Feel my wish, Feel my wind,
────Beyond the light

Hey, the brilliance of becoming one is delightful
We came to meet each other.
